name: Action Smacktion: Breaking Brouhaha
description:
Legends LIVE, the biggest streaming event of the century, is finally underway on Action Island. People from all over the
world come to fight for fame, glory, and everything in between all for the international audience to see! However, behind the glitz, glamor, and plaster is there something more sinister looking for a chance to embrace the world of the living?

  • Compete as the tunnel-visioned youth SwordJr. who enters the fray as a means to practice his sword skills under the tutelage of The Embodiment of Swordsmanship!
  • Become a crowd-pleasing legend by challenging a daily gauntlet of intense Turn-Based Battles against the world's strongest entertainers.
  • Refine your arsenal against your rivals by learning their strengths, weaknesses, and special skills from the exclusive Legends LIVE Trading cards.
  • Use the power of social media start a beef with your rivals to raise the stakes of the competition.

Amidst this brouhaha, what will you find beyond the blade?!

**This game is a work in progress. Assets not final. More Narrative, Battles, and Special Mechanics still on the way!**
